title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5004.2 - Additional eligibility requirements for members with a date of membership before July 27, 1976 (Tiers I and II)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5004.2 - Additional eligibility requirements for members with a date of membership before July 27, 1976 (Tiers I and II)

State Regulations
(a) Members must not have previously received
a loan during the semi-annual period (January 1st-June 30th or July
1st-December 31st (as applicable) in which the loan is to be issued. A member
must apply by June 15th in order to assure the loan is issued by June 30th and
must apply by December 15th in order to assure the loan is issued by December
31st. (b) A loan shall be at least
$300 and, together with any outstanding loan balance, shall not exceed 75
percent of the member's accumulated contributions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5004.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
